name: Godot tutorial king (tnx to GDQuest)
description:
Thanks to GDQuest, I was able to learn how to make this crap.

90% of the assets belong to GDQuest.Dont worry, I wont be updating this game, its bad.

Can you beat the boss?

There are a few bugs I dont have nerves to fix so if you hear a double squish sound effect lets say its an intentional critical hit lol.

I will be focusing on learning more about Godot

THANKS FOR PLAYING
